name: Flow Runner
description:
An endless runner where you avoid spikes, pits, slimes, and even birds. Stop by the shop to grab a snack to help you keep running. Don't get knocked off screen or lose too much health, otherwise game-over. Keeping track of your stamina is probably a good idea.

>>>CONTROLS<<< 

Space / Xbox A: Jump. Tap again to double jump.

C / XBOX X: Dash. Hold to Glide. 

X / XBOX B: Dive

>>>LINKS<<<
